name: BATTER BURST
description: This game is a scroll action of continuous explosion drawn with pixel art. Let's blow it all away.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
